overview: Lu Bi and Ye Xiaolu are two people who have never seen each other. They have not seen them for many years. After graduating from college, they happened to join the work of the Blue Sky Group. Lu Bi, with his talents and the appreciation of his daughter, Xiao Min, quickly took office. The head of the sales department of the company, Lu Bi, who likes Ye Xiaolu, always looks for opportunities to show off to Ye Xiao. Ye Xiaolu, who likes Lu Bi, finds that Xiao Min likes Lu Bi, Ye Xiaoluo’s career development for Lu Bi. Deliberately avoiding Lu Bi. The love entanglement of the three of them began.
title: 只对你钟情
